# ivar_getOffset(_:)

**Function**

Returns the offset of an instance variable.

## Declaration

```swift
func ivar_getOffset(_ v: Ivar) -> Int
```

## Discussion

For instance variables of type `id` or other object types, call [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/object_getIvar(_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/object_setIvar(_:_:_:)] instead of using this offset to access the instance variable data directly.

## Working with Instance Variables

- **ivar_getName(_:)**: Returns the name of an instance variable.
- **ivar_getTypeEncoding(_:)**: Returns the type string of an instance variable.
